item.title: Uninstall Third-Party Drivers with CMD
item.description: You can uninstall third-party drivers (such as the WAVES MaxxAudio Pro driver) from the Command Prompt (CMD) by using the "pnputil.exe" utility. Here's the basic process: Open Command Prompt as administrator: Press the Windows key + X, and then select "Command Prompt (Admin)". Type the following command and press Enter: 1pnputil.exe -e 2# or export the list to a file 3pnputil.exe -e > !drivers.csv This command lists all the third-party drivers installed on your system.
